product_name: Nike Set The Pace Shorts - Women's
long_description: Designed for freedom of movement, the women's Nike Set The Pace Shorts deliver cool comfort when you're running in hot weather. Lightweight, breathable Dri-FIT(R) outer shorts and built-in recycled crepe liner shorts wick away moisture and dry quickly. Tapered mesh side inserts provide ventilation and promote an easy range of motion. Elastic waistband with cinchable drawcord secures fit. The women's Nike Set The Pace Shorts feature a 3 in. inseam on the outer shorts.
short_description: Designed for freedom of movement, the women's Nike Set The Pace Shorts deliver cool comfort when you're running in hot weather.
